title: Bug 6304cannot synch a .java file and another resource
OB: When a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) are selected in the package viewer, the context menu does not display the 'Team' entry.
EB: The 'Team' entry should be displayed in the context menu when a .java file and another resource are selected in the package viewer.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Select a .java file and another resource (e.g., a .properties file) in the package viewer.
2. Open the context menu and observe that the 'Team' entry is missing.
